title: INTEGRATION_polyline test failure if gts is not installed

content.raw:
We must have missed a test case after approving pull request #1428, since there is now a [test failure](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/248/testReport/junit/(root)/INTEGRATION_polyline/test_ran/) if `libgts-dev` is not installed. There were previously compilation errors; now it is just a test failure:
~~~
247: [==========] Running 3 tests from 1 test case.
247: [----------] Global test environment set-up.
247: [----------] 3 tests from PhysicsEngines/PolylineTest
247: [ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/PolylineTest.PolylineWorld/0
247: [Msg] Waiting for master.
247: [Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
247: [Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.3.215
247: [Err] [MeshManager.cc:528] GTS library not found. Can not extrude polyline
247: [Err] [MeshManager.cc:632] Unable to extrude mesh. Triangulation failed
247: [Err] [MeshManager.cc:528] GTS library not found. Can not extrude polyline
247: [Err] [MeshManager.cc:632] Unable to extrude mesh. Triangulation failed
247: [Err] [MeshManager.cc:528] GTS library not found. Can not extrude polyline
247: [Err] [MeshManager.cc:632] Unable to extrude mesh. Triangulation failed
247: [Err] [MeshManager.cc:528] GTS library not found. Can not extrude polyline
247: [Err] [MeshManager.cc:632] Unable to extrude mesh. Triangulation failed
247: [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:145] ServerFixture load in 0.7 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
247: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/polyline.cc:94: Failure
247: The difference between sphere->GetWorldPose().pos.z and 1.5 is 1.0000000000195999, which exceeds 1e-2, where
247: sphere->GetWorldPose().pos.z evaluates to 0.49999999998040001,
247: 1.5 evaluates to 1.5, and
247: 1e-2 evaluates to 0.01.
247: [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:96] ServerFixture::Unload
247: [  FAILED  ] PhysicsEngines/PolylineTest.PolylineWorld/0, where GetParam() = "ode" (2037 ms)
247: [ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/PolylineTest.PolylineWorld/1
247: [Msg] Waiting for master.
247: [Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
247: [Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.3.215
247: [Err] [MeshManager.cc:528] GTS library not found. Can not extrude polyline
247: [Err] [MeshManager.cc:632] Unable to extrude mesh. Triangulation failed
247: 
247: 
 75/134 Test #247: INTEGRATION_polyline ..................................***Exception: SegFault 12.69 sec
~~~

@iche033
